org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg
Class MessageFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.MessageFactory

public class MessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton factory class which creates the concrete instances of a MessageParser and a MessageSerializer. Because the whole ReaderProtocol infrastructure can use the same parsers and the same serializers we can use a singleton instance of the parser and serialiser. Hence there is a singelton instance for each message binding.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
